value:
It's not that I dislike Selkie... I'd
just rather stay inside with my
treasures than roughhouse.

This place is full of interesting
scents...so many Heroes to smell!
*sniff sniff*

I love Daddy's scent. I never get tired
of smelling it... Come to think of it,
you smell pretty good, too.

Want to see my treasures? I have
a big pile of sawdust and some
rusty armor. And—oh!—a snake skin!

There's no way it's easy to keep a
castle this huge clean...$k$pI just know there are some
wonderful dust bunnies lurking
here somewhere!

You have great dust bunnies
here, right? That's what
$Nf told me.

You could pat my head a little bit...
I wouldn't mind.
*sniff sniff* I smell stronger!
This is boring.

Here, take this furball! It's my way
of saying thanks!

I'm Velouria. Nice to meet you.
If you say you need me...then
I'll do my best to fight, I guess.

I really like being alone the best.
Nothing bothers me, and I can do
whatever I want.$k$pWell...actually, I've changed my
mind a little bit since I came here.$k$pThere are so many people here,
and each has their own way of
looking at things...$k$pBut they accept each other's
differences.$k$pNobody tries to bother me if I don't
want to be bothered... Nobody forces
me to do anything I don't want to do.$k$pEveryone here is so good to me...
It really motivates me.$k$pI have the feeling that if I stick with
you, I'll find treasures I never could
have found by myself.
えい
いきます
きゃああっ！
…すみません…
Looks tasty.
Hey! You're no dust bunny!
Too much work.
A-hunting I will go!
Good-bye...
Heehee
Hrm. Your smell... It's different than anybody else's.
I don't mind if you scratch me.
I'm bored. That doesn't mean I want you to give me work to do. It just means I'm bored.
Hmm, not an unpleasant scent. You smell nice, in fact!
This is a fluffy, delightful dust bunny, if I say so myself. There's nothing quite like the downy bliss of a dust bunny's touch...
Daddy smells good. Being without him is a punishment every bit as bad as death
That feels good. I like it when you fluff my fur.
OK.
Dust bunny!
What do you want?
